reviews.review:
Я думаю про эту игру не надо писать большой обзор,потому что в неё играли большинство геймеров и знают её наизусть.Но всё же напишу обзор для тех кто не играл в эту прекрасную игру.
Мы играем тем же Гордоном Фрименом.
По событиям прошлой части произошла катастрофа,а в конце первой half life мы согласились работать на неизвестного до сих пор G-Man,он помещает нас в стазис и обещает увидеться с нами позже.
Спустя около двух десятилетий,G-Man пробуждает нас из стазиса для работы.
Мы прибываем в Сити 17 на пассажирском поезде.На вокзале мы собераемся сесть на поезд до Нова-Проспект,но нас останавливает сотрудник Гражданской обороны и заставляет нас пройти в комнату для допроса.
Ну а что будет дальше,вы узнаете сами.

Dopo 15 ben spese ore di gioco, sono giunto alla conclusione di questo fantastico gioco targato mamma VALVe. Il gioco è ottimo in tutti gli aspetti qualitativi. Ha un buon comparto audio, ogni tanto i livelli sono un po difficili in quanto gli enigmi non mancano mai, storia avvincente. L' AI è eccellente e questo dimostra come un titolo del 2004 possa battere alcuni titoli FPS di recente usciti (non faccio nomi). Quella punta di difficoltà è veramente la ciliegina sulla torta di questo spettacolo videoludico. L' unica pecca è il doppiaggio italiano che ti farà implorare le orecchie. Per il resto, è veramente ottimo.
P.S Se siete stanchi di un CoD - Battlefield con dei livelli troppo "pieni di corridoi" (per la loro linearità) ve lo consiglio al 100%

100\10

I loved the FIRST Half Life. It was a ground-breaking game with great graphics, brilliant physics and, most of all, a first-rate story (I played it whilst writing up my PhD - but not in physics). I genuinely considered this to be the greatest games ever produced. I was thrilled therefore about the second one - Half Life 2. This had amazing reviews, but sadly this did not deliver anything like the experience of the first game. It has many, many great features: the artistry, particularly of the backgrounds, is stunning, the sense of movement and scale is dramatic, the life-like physics of the world through which you travel is amazingly realistic. It is a very fast paced romp through some beautiful sets with an awful lot of shooting bad guys (the main function of an FPS I suppose). BUT it is so fast that you have no time, no breathing space, to appreciate the beauty of the your character's surroundings. Unlike Deus Ex (albeit a later game) where you are encouraged not to kill, but rather to be stealthy and explore, there is none of this in Half-Life 2. To be honest it became quite boring and repetitive shooting your way around yet another ruined street scene to then be hurried on to the next one to do exactly the same. Personally I love exploring these strange virtual worlds (I like shooting bad guys too, preferably by sniping them) but I was not given the opportunity to do so here (I understand I might be in the minority here). That is a great shame. My biggest gripe is about the STORY. Half-Life 2 has no story (regardless of what the adverts say). Here was a great opportunity to get to know some of the characters and weave an interesting story around them (as in the first game) with surprises and twists (as in the first game). Here the characters merely guide Gordon down a long and bloody road. I had hoped that the ending would reveal something. Who, for example, are the Combine? But the ending a huge anti-climax. So to conclude: I would recommend this if your only interest is a fast-paced shooter. For that it is very good. BUT if you want more subtlety and particularly story than that, then I would leave Gordon and his suit behind.
Half life 2, and its episodes are the best games I have ever played. These games are all about the story and how your character interacts with it. Masterpiece!

Truly a classic. It hasn't aged as well as it could have, but this game revolutionized games. I wish I could say more, but this is a masterpiece of gaming. While It's not my favourite game, I certainly respect it. It's still fun though. If you want to play a slice of gaming history, pick this up. It's pretty grand.

I don't feel like I have to write a review on this because there are already thousands of reviews telling to get this game and why,  but I couldn't resist giving this game the praise it deserved. I can't think of anything that I didn't enjoy in this game. The physics based combat and puzzles hasn't been matched in quality since this was released. It has an expansive and just plain awesome arsenal. The story is great, the gameplay is near-perfect, the concepts are so well thought out and executed, and it still holds up well today. The only time I ever had something against the game was with some checkpoints that can be passed by changing the difficulty and not having to deal with the checkpoints. I honestly can't say enough great things about this game. Play this to see why we need Half-LIfe 3. 10/10

I don't really get why everybody loves this game so much. It's very stressful to play, and there are some parts where you'll just want the game to end forever. I guess I'll be the only person in this planet not waiting for Half life 3, I had to stop playing the second part of the series because I just couldn' take it, it's a waste of time. Go play any other game and at least have some fun
It has been 10 years since the launch, and it still feels like a "nowadays" game. I'm sure I'll still feel this way 10 years from now ;)

Half-Life 2 je nepochybně jedna z nejlepších her na světě. Možná si říkáte proč? Povím vám to. Příběh hry se odehrává pár let po nepovedeném experimentu v Black Mese, a to je vše co vám prozradím #nospoilers. I když se nejedná o nic světoborného, je velice povedený. Délka hry je dobrá, ikdyž jsem ji dohrál 26. Achievement Hunterům se to určitě líbit bude. Samostatný Half Life 2 má pouze Singleplayerovou kampaň, ale ani vám nebude vadit to, že ve hře není Multiplayer. Od toho Valve udělal HL2 Deatchmatch.

Что такое Half-Life 2? Это шедевральная игра с занятным сюжетом и механикой. Физика в игре на мой взгляд лучшая среди всех игр (Portal не в счёт). Вы можете взять со стола лезвие от болгарки и метнуть его в зомбей, которых просто порвёт на части, можете расстреливать этих гадов из автоматов и пистолетов, можете кидать в них бочки с топливом... Ваши возможности почти не ограничены. Сюжет игры довольно линейный и предсказуемый, но всё равно интересный.
Особо порадовала Аликс - вроде добрая, милая няша, но со спокойным лицом готова расстреливать метрокопов, так они вроде называются. Всё хорошо озвучено, а особенно порадовал Гордон - лучшая озвучка века.😆
По своей традиции, перечислю плюсы и минусы.
Плюсы:
 +Хорошая графика при низких требах (пошла на планшете с Atom Z3735F и двумя гб оперативы)
 +Занятный сюжет.
 +Физика выше всяких похвал.
Минусы:
 -Отсутствие Half-Life 3...
В общем, игра выше всяких похвал. 10/10.

Half-Life 2 es la secuela del aclamado Half-Life (Obviamente). El juego te coloca otra vez en el traje anaranjado de Gordon Freeman, un aclamado ingeniero de MIT que sobrevive a la apertura de una brecha interdimensional que permite el ingreso a nuestro planeta de alienígenas hostiles. Este juego se ubica varios años después de Half-Life 1 y muchas cosas han cambiado, y como cosa rara... el gobierno tiene mucho que ver con la situación de sus habitantes.

Lo califico con un 10/10, la experiencia es increíble, recomiendo comprar también los DLC porque incluyen capítulos de la historia que sucede después de Half-Life 2

Valvenin yaptığı en güzel oyun sanırım bu. Senaryo muhteşem. Günümüz oyun grafiklerine nazaran biraz geri kalmış olsada hala harika bir oyun. Herkesin mutlaka bir defa bitirmesi ve half-life dünyasını keşfetmesini isterim.
Valve的招牌游戏，在当年简直是划时代的大作！细腻的人物，丰富多样的武器，真实的游戏场景都让这款科幻FPS充满可玩性。战斗流畅爽快，就是地图有点绕，一到大场景就得迷路，还没小地图，任务提示全靠NPC对话，有的场景那个迷茫的啊，不来回绕个4、5回都没一点头绪。总之Half-Life2这种经典是不得不入的。

Que voy a decir de esta obra maestra. Me pase en 2013  el half life 2, y me soprendio, me agrado, y pense que estaria genial tener la continuacion de este juego. Lo mejor viene, cuando a finales de 2014 compre este juego y sus expansiones. Rejugue Half Life 2, volvio a soprenderme y encartarme.  Jugue al episodio 1 y 2. Cuando termine el episodio dos, solte dos lagrimas, y comprendi porque la gente desea half life 3 con tantas ganas. Si no lo habeis jugado, jugarlo sin dudar porque os sonprendera. Imaginad que me emociono jaja...

A parte tiene unas mecannicas de juego que JAMAS te aburriras en la partida, olvidate de los tiroteos de los shooters moderno escondido y agachado en algun sitio, asomandote para poder matar a la IA sin quwe te destrocen. Y no porque sea facil, si no porque los enemigos vienen en la cantidad jsuta para la accion y el respiro. Lo rejugue en dificil, es una pasada como sin llegar al cliche es capaz de ponerte en muy serios aprietos. ES PERFECTO, UNA OBRA MAESTRA, LO ADORARAS CUAL DIOS, Y PEDIRAS QUE SAQUEN LA CONTINUACION CUANDO JUEGUES LAS EXPANSIONES Y TE QUEDES FLIPANDO CON TODOS LOS COLORES EXISTENTES Y POR HABER. Juegalo, disfrutalo, y a esperar que VALVE nos haga el honor. Una ardua tarea, si, pero a veces hay que jugarsela. Y JUGARLO!!!

NOTA: 100 SOBRE 10 y no es hype jaja saludos si lo has leido todo...

Predict the story as you go and glitch you way through the puzzles and fight from point A to point B, in this mediocre storyline.
Seriously though, the games pretty overrated. The story line isn't anything special: You find a safe place the bad guys scare you away, you run and fight until you have to dive into hell itself. Semi common story. Very predictable. Example: The father yells over radio: "DON'T GO INTO RAVEN-"
Obviously going to Ravenholm. Her father gets captured, in my mind I'm thinking "We're going to have to go into the most guarded area to save him" Yep.

Gameplay: Shoot from point A to point B with a few companions or so. Not special, enemies are unique looking but simply programmed. 

Puzzles: Either super easy or you have to glitch your way through it.
Examples: Simple: Put a few barrels into the water under a bridge to make the bridge traversable by vehicle. Having to glitch: In the airboat you need to put crap in a box to make the board raise so you can ramp over a wall. Simple, except there wasn't enough crap to put in the box. I had to throw a grenade in, it exploded and glitched the system to thing the blast pressure was still inacting on the box, and I was able to ramp. 

Downvoted. Its not bad but terribly over rated.
One of the greatest games ever made. Incredible story and gameplay, with some of the richest characters ever presented in the medium. A must play for anyone who loves video games

İnceleme yazmak için bile geç kaldığımı fark ettim. Ancak zaten bu seriyi iki senede bir tekrar etmezsem rahat edemem. Eski olmasına rağmen 512mb ddr ram ve 512 mb fx5500 ile oynayabildiğim bir oyundur. Kimi yerde bulmaca, kimi yerde korku ve aksiyon öğelerine rastlayabiliriz. Oyunu Orange Box olarak alırsanız rahat edersiniz. Hem de daha ucuza gelir. Seriyi tamamlamadan bırakmayın ama. Hiç oynamasanız bile kütüphanenizde mutlaka bulunması gereken başyapıtlardan biridir.

Apenas uma palavra pode descrever esse jogo – Ele é incrível.
Obs: Contem alguns Spoilers :)

Half-Life 2 traz tudo o que o primeiro game trouxe e revoluciona ainda mais.A saga de Gordon Freeman continua 20 anos depois de onde ela parou no último jogo,já que G-Man deixou Gordon em coma durante esse tempo.E que tempo.O mundo,desde que Freeman dorme pela última vez,mudou muito.

O Incidente de Black Mesa proporcionado por Freeman no primeiro jogo permitiu que uma raça alienígena entrasse na Terra e dominasse tudo,criando até um campo de supressão para a raça humana não se reproduzir.Wallace Breen,antigo chefe da Black Mesa,agora é o “Dono da Terra”,posto dado á ele pelos Combine,a raça alienígena que invadiu o planeta.

Outro ponto ótimo é a História do jogo.Um enfoque em personagens foi feito,já que a única interação humana que víamos no primeiro jogo eram cientistas abrindo portas (E depois,matar eles sem motivo).Agora nós temos personagens que interagem e constroem uma história.São Eli Vance,Alyx Vance,Isaac Kleiner,Barney Calhoun (Que é protagonista de um jogo da série Half Life – A expansão Blue Shift),Wallace Breen e outros.Eles tornam a história mais viva e muito melhor – E sim,parece existir um interesse romântico de Gordon em Alyx.

-Pontos Positivos :)
-Adição de personagens bem-construídos.
-História bem-trabalhada e com final bem misterioso.
-Adição de veículos!
-Possibilidade de ter uma parceira,Alyx Vance,te ajudando em alguns momentos do jogo.
-Física muito boa.
-Possibilidade de recrutar revolucionários em determinado período do game.
-Batalhas divertidas e que exigem raciocínio.
-Gráfico maravilhoso.
-A Inteligência Artificial continua boa.

-Pontos negativos :(
-Parece mais curto que o anterior,mas nem é muito.
-Falta de áreas estilo do primeiro jogo com salas com muitos monstros.
-Também parece mais fácil.
-Pela vigésima vez,Valve,onde está Half-Life 3?
Un must. Storia epica, campagna coinvolgente e personaggi fantastici.

Уже почти наступило десять лет с момента выхода Half-Life 2, но я с уверенностью могу сказать, что игра ничуть не растеряла своего "обаяния". Запустив игру сейчас, всё так же можно проникнуться атмосферой мрачного мира, установившегося "нового совершенного порядка". Восточно-европейский стиль архитектуры и резко выделяющиеся, чужеродные здания альянса в Сити 17; заброшенный и разбитый пригород, наполненный множеством опасностей - всё это пугает и одновременно завораживает.

El padre de los FPS, buen shooter, cuenta con una muy buena historia, la cual ocurre en le mismo universo de Portal. Para estar a 18/01/2015 los graficos siguen siendo decentes, ha envejecido bien (nada que envidiar a un COD).

Words can't simply describe this game and how i feel about it.

Simply put play this game.
